plot: A TV series which depicts the clash of different value systems and mentalities of Montenegrin two families, one from the old city of Budva, and the other from transitional Niksic.
plot_en: A TV series which depicts the clash of different value systems and mentalities of Montenegrin two families, one from the old city of Budva, and the other from transitional Niksic.
plot_es: A TV series which depicts the clash of different value systems and mentalities of Montenegrin two families, one from the old city of Budva, and the other from transitional Niksic.
title: Budva na pjenu od mora
